  • Method Details

    • ctx_config

      public static String[] ctx_config()

      Returns the names of all XML Configuration Files to be injected by the Root Application Context.


      Details

      • All Beans injected by the Root Context are globally accessible.

        • Implementations of ApplicationContextAware expose all Beans injected using the XML Configurations defined by this method.
        • Implementations of ApplicationContextAware do *NOT* expose *ANY* Beans injected using XML Configurations defined outside this method.

      • Additional XML Configurations can be defined elsewhere to restrict XML-Injected Bean visibility to more specific scopes.

        • All global XML-Injected Beans *MUST* be defined by this method.
        • XML Configurations defined outside this method must *NOT* be accessible in the Root Scope.

      XML Configuration Integration Options

      • Pass XML File Names to an XML Context.
      • Parse Raw XML into a Generic Application Context using a stand-alone XML Reader.

      • Parse Raw XML into an XmlReaderContext using an enclosed XML Reader.


        XmlReaderContext Information

        • XmlReaderContext does *NOT* implement ApplicationContext.
        • i.e., XmlReaderContext can *NOT* be used as an ApplicationContext.
        • Reader Context *DOES* offer additional functionality and flexibility to XML Reader.
        • XmlReaderContext, in turn, *DOES* grant improved control over parsing Raw XML into an ApplicationContext.

      Returns:
      An array of XML file names ready to be used to construct a XML Context.
